name: Able Answer
text: Blaze Pizza is a radical restaurant. Magnificent, made to please pizza, with fresh ingredients selected, and served while you salivate and wait for the brick ovens to do their dance on delectable delights . I even witnessed two couples, ‚Ä¶More

name: RANDOM WICKED
text: Ordered curbside and was greeted on time and politely. Food is always great- I got to work with my order and both my pizzas were drowned in balsamic & ranch. Far more than the "drizzle" they mention. I even specified "light" on both pizzas.  Manager promptly took care of issue.....  Thank you Case for the understanding.

name: Chrissy Grzadzinski
text: It was great! First time here and it had a great atmosphere, great service, great attitudes, and loved the drink selection as well as the food! Pizzas were excellent and the entire family was satisfied! Will come back! Thank you!

name: Ian Peterson
text: Favorite Place to get pizza, employees are nice and considerate, food is always good and perfectly made. A MUST try if you never have been!

name: Brittany Rose
text: Don‚Äôt even attempt to contact the store directly. I placed a delivery order and forgot to add a side, so I called quickly to add it to the order. After 3 minutes of endless menu options, none of which are to talk to an employee, it finally ‚Ä¶More

name: Trooper Long
text: The staff showed good teamwork, the way they expedited busy dinner time carry out traffic.

name: Gary Smith
text: I LOVE this place. The 11" build your own pizza is a great deal if you want to get creative as you can add unlimited toppings (and they offer a ton of options). It comes standard with thin crust but for an upcharge you can request rising ‚Ä¶More

name: Elango Elangovan
text: Excellent quality and price; we can build our own pizza; friendly staff!

name: Cory Smith
text: Great service, prices and food!

name: Anna Collins
text: I love the keto crust!!!! Please keep it!! The keto crust is what introduced me to Blaze Pizza and I've fallen in love. I went there 3 times In one weekend when I discovered it. The keto crust is amazing

name: Kimmy M
text: We did takeout and it went very well! We all did build your own, and they all turned out very good!

name: Jack Werner
text: I just watched my pizza get dropped on the floor after it got made, and then after it was thrown away none of the crew knew where my order was so I had to wait 25 more minutes for another one to come out. Good food but poor service in this instance :/

name: J McGuire
text: The thin crust pizza was great, and since they make it in front of you, you get it exactly how you like it, the price is on par and fair for what you get. Everytime I've gone in the employees have always been very nice and friendly and they ‚Ä¶More

name: Damon White
text: The build-your-own quick service model FINALLY done right for pizza! Great fresh food, quick and thoughtful service. Come her! Enjoy!

name: M A R
text: This place is fantastic. They made my 9 years old feel so special, bye going above and beyond when they sang him happy birthday.

name: Ore Nuga
text: Build your own pizza. What can I say. Service is always great. You can build a veggie, or gluten free pizza. Quality is more than decent

name: Martin Ashley
text: My experience with blaze pizza was unacceptable, the manager with the glasses and blue hair was very demanding and kinda rude for no reason. All of the other workers even the older lady was calm and nice but he was kinda out of control. ‚Ä¶More

name: Eric Fernando
text: Great pizza! Nice clean restaurant and friendly staff.

name: Billy Brownard

name: Emily Conser
text: Build your open pizza and have it fire cooked! Fun and yum! Staff was very friendly. I look forward to going again!

name: Nick Hopwood
text: Not going back. Slow and rude service. Order in the app for 6pm pick up and at 6:12 inquire as to  the status and they pizzas have not been prepped yet, while others who walked in after 6pm are already eating. Then I am made to feel like I‚Äôve done something wrong. Good pizza, terrible staff.

name: Tonya Shoults
text: Tasty, easy lunch when you want good pizza on the go. Staff is always friendly and I love that I can order online ahead of time and pick it up. I love the veg-out pizza with pesto and mozzerella (instead of red sauce and gorgonzola).

name: Lauren Hickman
text: I have a gluten allergy, and they are so good about glove changes and making sure things are cleaned off. The gluten free crust is better than most I‚Äôve tried. It still gets crispy and isn‚Äôt too dense, dry, or chewy. This is my go-to place when I need a pizza fix.

name: Janice
text: My very first time here. The staff was very friendly knew what they were doing. They offered different ways to fix your pizza I really enjoyed having my üçï pizza prepared my way. The atmosphere was very nice

name: Kevin Davis
text: Horrible...If my family wasn't already here eating I would have left. Employees got in a fight, left us all standing in line, took 47 minutes to order and pay. No apologies offered...Everything was out in the display case and drink station was out of order or not refilled and gross.  So inefficient.

name: Wesley Fabian
text: Staff is always really friendly, good is good, ample and affordable. Good business model.

text: Great customer service!

text: Great employees!

text: Asking for balsamic is like asking for a swimming pool. You shouldn‚Äôt have to dab each slice with a napkin to make it edible. You can‚Äôt taste anything but the balsamic. With such a strong tasting sauce it should be obvious not to drown the pizza in it.

It's good pizza overall. Very quickly made.

My wife and daughters love the pizza, and I can enjoy my own build your own pizza with the high-rise crust.  Friendly staff, always clean, and delicious and consistent food that hits the spot every time.  A family favorite!

name: David Krasnow

Fast service for cheap (but kinda disapointing) pizza

text: I like to believe I'm one of the more patient people while going out to eat, but this place was honestly ridiculous. Nobody looked like they knew what to do, and it clearly showed with taking OVER an hour to get two pizzas when there was only about 8-10 people ahead of us. Having three bad experices in a row is enough for me.

name: W D
text: It's just a busy day, I guess.  We waited 50 minutes to get our pizzas.  Totally under staffed.  And the pizza were over cooked, crusts are hard to bite ... Exercise for my jaw.  Cannot complain about the employee s, they were super busy.  Just need more people, so everything got taken cared better.  I still like the pizzas though.

name: Brandt Bowling
text: Decent pizza and not too expensive for what you get. I like the atmosphere and I've never had bad service there.

name: Brian Falzon
text: I have eaten at this location at least 5 times and it is always a 5 star experience.  The staff is very friendly and courteous.  The pizza is always spot on.   The dining area is very clean.  If you are looking for pizza  I would highly recommend you to stop here.

name: Denise Miller
text: Awesome pizza and service! My first time and I had an excellent pizza thanks to my server explaining how it works. I'll be back!

text: Love the concept. Build your own wood fired pizza. Fast casual. Natural fresh ingredients. Great flavor crust and sauce. Friendly staff. Although a little slow.

name: Nana Kubo
text: The create your own option is great

name: Rick Richter
text: I go there about once a week. It is always good and I think a bargain for the price. I had a pizza there his week cooked by a young lady and it was perfect, not burned anywhere and there were no burned bits of corn meal on the underside. That and the aqua fresca drinks are awesome

name: Kellan S
text: I loved my pineapple pizza. The server, Eliza, was friendly and polite. I would eat there again.

text: Somewhat inconsistent product/service, but good thing crust pizza. Definitely get the blood orange lemonade! Desserts can be warmed up next to the oven if you prefer too.

text: Only 2 employees working during dinner rush. It seemed one employee was new, and they were both very nice. However, multiple customers waited in line for about 10 minutes and then left realizing it was going to take so long.  Total wait time to order was 30 min, plus additional time for pizza to cook.

name: Sevin Dennis
text: Staff is epic and has pretty good pizzas too.

name: Don Prior

name: Luke Markham
text: Waited in line for 10 min while employees wandered around aimlessly.  Watching a NASCAR race in its entirety then going somewhere else would be faster.

name: Jonathan Komorowski
text: Good pizza with good options for customization. Friendly and efficient staff are a plus.

name: Katie Fraser
text: Always excellent. The Green pizza is my favorite, and the staff was fun and friendly.

name: Jackie Vogt
text: Really good oven fired pizzas. Tons of topping options to make you own creation as well as several suggested configurations. Fast and friendly service. Good prices, and they don't go up as you add more toppings.

name: John Wilson
text: I had never been to a Blaze Pizza before but everyone here was so lovely. They greeted every customer and kept things simple. I was satisfied before I even got my food, so it was just a bonus that it was delicious too!

name: Nicky Stowe
text: The pizza was good, and reasonably priced [$6-$8]. You can build your own, or order one of their pizza choices. ‚Ä¶More

name: Darryl Spring
text: Great pizza for a discount! A lot of coupons and promotions online and through the app.Very kind and understanding managers and many fresh vibrant faces!

text: Great individual sized pizza especially for the price. The unique drink options are great too. I love the business model. I recommend this place all the time.

text: The pizza is great! Lots of toppings, including artichokes, one of my favorites. That said, the lines at this location are definitely slow, I haven't tried other locations to know if it is only slow here. You can always order online though, and that's what we do most often.

text: Love it...as many toppings as you want and staff is helpful.

name: Sarah Bur
text: For the price, the efficiency, and the taste, you can't beat it! The pizzas are only $7.95 no matter how much you put on it! You can add whatever you want. And I had a piece or two left over. I got the Red Vine, which is like a margherita ‚Ä¶More

name: Vivien Li
text: Great customizable toppings, you can get as many meats, cheeses and veggies as you want! They have feta, goat cheese, ovalini mozz, pesto sauce and garlic sauce.  One personal pizza is more than enough for one person, I always have leftovers.  Super quick and convenient and good quality for the price you are paying.

name: Schineman Fam
text: I love eating at blaze. The pizza is great and the staff are very friendly!!!

name: Bruce Popejoy
text: Staffing levels are important if you want y o get customers in and out in a timely manner. Would also help that the employees would make and bake the pizza the way you ordered it.

name: Aja Smith
text: came to blaze today and right when they opened they had a order for 22 pizzas online and they rock them out my and my friend watched while they all worked together and still made other peoples pizza at the same time great job blaze staff

name: Tyler J. Hughes
text: Waited over an hour for a subpar pizza. The staff were disorganized, unprofessional, and had no idea what they were doing. This place has some serious issues running an efficient operation, and at the rate they're going, they'll be closed by 2017.

name: Jamella Smith
text: GREAT FOOD KID FRIENDLY AWESOME STAFF

name: Nikole Sena Carneiro
text: I really like the pizza and the red vine is my favorite. The staff is friendly.

name: Matt Stetson
text: This place has had the absolute worst service. I have now ordered twice online ahead of time, and after arriving 30 minutes after ordering, they still have not even put my order together. To make it worse, they didn't seem to even care ‚Ä¶More

name: Dani Schlaff
text: Service was absolutely horrible. Workers were rude and slow. Pizza was burnt and they were out of everything. Ranch was out and a worker goes "that sucks". The worst service I've ever experienced. Don't recommend. In need of new workers and managers ASAP.

name: Tom Caldwell
text: Under staffed.  Long wait time. The staff is not efficient.  Pizza is ok, prices are decent.  The previous Pizza place in same location was far better.

name: Vardan Sargsyan
text: Build your own pizza.... Unlimited toppings

name: Daniel Levine
text: Good quick pizzas that aren't too expensive.

name: Ashley LeFever
text: The food is never that great. Last time we went in the place smelled horrible so we left without ordering.

name: Jody Cook
text: Great service, clean environment, delicious food

name: marci merrill
text: Yummy & you can pick toppings

name: Benjamin Crawford
text: Best pizza joint of the CENTURY!!!!!!! I would have uploaded a picture, but the pizza didn't last too long.

name: Josh Taylor
text: Best ingredients. Fantastic Pizza.

name: Federico S
text: Great pizza, long line at peak hour

name: Steven Harvey
text: Vegan cheese option and lots of veggies. A pretty decent gluten free crust option too.

text: If there is a line, even 3-4 people, see what's happening in the first 30 seconds, as you could spend the next hour waiting!!!

name: Ryan Bagby
text: Slowest moving line I've ever encountered. If my wife, who was one person in front of me, hadn't paid ten minutes ago we'd be gone. I will not return.

name: Paula Link
text: I would say the pizza was a 3 or 4 but the floors and glass casing were filthy,  table were dirty I got a salad well the the worst ever it was premade and bathroom looked like it hasn't  been  cleaned in a month.
